item.description:
Rating nearly 4 stars on Yelp!, Taipei Tokyo is a popular eatery in Davis Square offering a wide variety of reasonably priced Asian cuisine from old stand-bys Pad Thai and General Gau's Chicken to over 40 different types of sushi.  There are a handful of vegetable dishes and steamed healthy entrees as well. 

Let's meet, greet, and eat.

Note: a separate Meet-up is scheduled following dinner at the Balch Arena Theater where many of us will gather to watch our Drama students perform Oscar Wilde's The Importance of Being Earnest.  Please check out that Meet-up too and RSVP separately for each event.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be the bald dude possibly wearing a Meet-up name tag.
item.why: Join your colleagues after work for a scorpion bowl and a combination of fine Chinese & Japanese cuisine, as well as Sushi at Taipei Tokyo in Davis Square.
item.name: Jumbo Dinner: Asian Cuisine
